body.prompt:
Generate a fake conversation between a customer and an agent.
The agent should introduce themselves, their company and give the customer
their name. The agent should ask for the customer's name.
As part of the conversation, have the agent ask for two pieces of
personal information.  Spell out numbers. For example, 1000 should be
said as one zero zero zero, not one thousand. The conversation should be
at least 10 lines long and be complete. At the end
of the conversation, the agent should thank the customer for their time
and end the conversation. Return the conversation formatted 
like the following example:

{'conversation': 
    [
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': 'xxxxx'}, 
    {'speaker': 'Customer', 'message': "xxxxx."}, 
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': "xxxxxx"}
    ] 
}

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Hello, thank you for contacting XYZ Car Dealership. My name is Carl Robinson.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: May I have your name, please?

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Nice to meet you, Judy. Can you please provide me with your phone number for verification?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Yes, it's five five five, two four six, one two three four.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you, Judy. Could you also confirm your home address for our records?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Sure, it's one two three Main Street, Cityville.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Great, thank you for that information. Is there anything specific you would like assistance with today, Judy?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: I'm feeling nervous about the shipping of my new car.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: I understand, Judy. I will ensure we address your concerns. Thank you for taking the time to speak with me today. Have a great day!
